description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Back Banner of the Doom Eagels Chapter. Back Banner provides its usual benefits even if the character is not the Kill-Team leader. If they are the Kill Team Leader, they restore Willpower Bonus Cohesion each time they spend a Fate Point to restore Cohesion.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 35 R
description.summary: Master Crafted Relic Back Banner of the Doom Eagels Chapter. Back Banner provides its usual benefits even if the character is not the Kill-Team leader. If they are the Kill Team Leader, they restore W

system.effect: Master Crafted Relic Back Banner of the Doom Eagels Chapter. Back Banner provides its usual benefits even if the character is not the Kill-Team leader. If they are the Kill Team Leader, they restore Willpower Bonus Cohesion each time they spend a Fate Point to restore Cohesion.
